revised_title: Electro-Physiological Researches: Sixth Series - Laws of Electric Discharge in Torpedo and Other Electric Fishes - Theory of Electricity Production in These Animals
tldr: Carlo Matteucci's research explores the electric discharge of torpedo and other electric fishes, discovering the connection between nervous influence and electricity. He explains the anatomy and function of electric organs, the relation between nervous force and electricity, and the laws governing the electric discharge in these animals.
